parlay.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to use advantages that you already have, such as your skills, experience, or money, and increase their value by using all your opportunities well
parlay.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He owned five movie theaters, which he eventually parlayed into hotels.
parlay.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to increase the value of something you have, especially your abilities, money, or success, by using your opportunities well
parlay.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The party chairman parlayed his political contacts into a vastly lucrative legal practice.
